subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Josh Howard had 29 points, 9 rebounds and a career-best 7 assists Sunday, leading Dallas to a 98-76 victory over the Clippers while Dirk Nowitzki served a one-game suspension.
snippet: Josh Howard had 29 points, 9 rebounds and a career-best 7 assists Sunday, leading Dallas to a 98-76 victory over the Clippers while Dirk Nowitzki served a one-game suspension.
